title: 97/228/EC: Commission Decision of 3 March 1997 amending Decision 95/124/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in Germany (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 March 1997 amending Decision 95/124/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in Germany (Text with EEA relevance) (97/228/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 95/124/EC is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 March 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
